description: Named after the founder himself. The Enzo was Ferrari's ultimate statement in 2004 â€” a naturally aspirated 6.0L V12 producing 651 horsepower, wrapped in Pininfarina bodywork derived from Formula One. Only 400 were built. This one has been hiding for twenty years.
lore: Diesel's secret. He's had it for 20 years, stored under a tarp in a storage unit off Route 9. He'll only give it to someone who understands what it means.
